participant_1.background:
I love wearing clothes that make me feel like I can take on the world.
I'm a talented singer, but I'm afraid to tell my parents because they might want me to perform in public.
i m fabulous from my on trend haircut to my louis vuittons.
I am single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art.
I try to feel younger by spending time with my cat.

participant_2.background:
I once swam across a river to get back to my car after getting a speeding ticket.
i am from mexico.
I enjoy practicing my religion, reading, and spending time with my friends and family.
I am Hispanic and my friends are my family.
My custom truck is my pride and joy.

content.text: Hello! I am a talented singer but i am afraid of telling my parents because they might want me to perform in public.
Hello there! Do not be afraid to share your talent with the world. It sounds like you have a lot to offer.
Thank you for the encouragement! I am single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art.
That is great! I am from Mexico and I love spending time with my friends and family.
That sounds like a wonderful life. I love spending time with my cat.
Cats are great! I once swam across a river to get back to my car after getting a speeding ticket.
That sounds like a crazy adventure! I would love to hear more about it.

It was definitely an adventure! I was driving through Mexico when I got pulled over for speeding. The cop said I had to pay a fine or I would have to have my car impounded. I did not have any money on me so I decided to swim across the river to get back to my car.
That is amazing! I am glad you were able to make it back to your car.
Thank you! I am glad I was able to get back to my car too!
